channel.title: Barrows doesnt work fully
channel.description:
Ok, on my server after i kill lets say "Dharoks brother" and i try to kill him again it says i already killed him. Thats not the problem though.
The problem is when I kill all of the brothers it doesnt reset to let me kill them over again, it keeps telling me i've already killed this brother, how do I add killcount and make it where it resets after 6 kills?

item.title: Barrows doesnt work fully
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

Ok, on my server after i kill lets say “Dharoks brother” and i try to kill him again it says i already killed him. Thats not the problem though.

The problem is when I kill all of the brothers it doesnt reset to let me kill them over again, it keeps telling me i’ve already killed this brother, how do I add killcount and make it where it resets after 6 kills?
